title: Mark Cavendish Sick on Bike, Dropped on First Climbs of Tour de France
content:
Cavendish suffers in extreme heat, dangles off the back of the peloton in opening day of his quest to win a 35th Tour de France stage.

Read the full article at Mark Cavendish Sick on Bike, Dropped on First Climbs of Tour de France on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
